name: Untitled Cockatrice Game
description:
This single-level project is a re-skinned 2D platformer. Play as Trixi, a cockatrice in search of the Secular Goblet.

Updates from original version:

  • Triple-jump physics replace double-jump
  • Completely re-designed characters, props, and tilemap
  • Completely re-designed UI
  • Completely re-designed SFX and music
